title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration with all Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, embed and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing LangChain applications to use Ollama-hosted models for chat, completion and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, multi-modal support and user authentication.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama offering fluent API design, streaming support and comprehensive model operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama API, supporting chat, generation, embeddings and model management operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line interface for Ollama with interactive chat, conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into the editor as AI coding assistant with inline completions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into Discord servers for chat, image understanding and custom commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama with session memory, model switching and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node enabling no-code workflows to interact with Ollama for chat, completion and embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with idiomatic interfaces, streaming support and context cancellation.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for containerized CI/CD pipelines, allowing model tests and deployments.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting threaded conversations, app mentions and private channels.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with async/await support, strong typing and serde serialization.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-php
summary: PHP client for Ollama with PSR-18 HTTP client compatibility, Laravel package discovery and streaming responses.
